anya-e0905n2:2_0: Pucchā – yaṁ tena āvuso bhagavatā…pe… sammāsambuddhena atirekacīvaraṁ dasāhaṁ atikkāmentassa nissaggiyaṁ pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ.

anya-e0905n2:7_0: Pucchā – ekarattaṁ āvuso ticivarena vippavasantassa nissaggiyaṁ pācittiyaṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n2:9_0: Pucchā – kaṁ āvuso ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ paññattaṁ.

anya-e0905n2:12_0: Pucchā – akālacīvaraṁ āvuso paṭiggahetvā māsaṁ atikkāmentassa nissaggiyaṁ pācittiyaṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n2:14_0: Pucchā – kaṁ āvuso ārabbbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n2:15_0: Vissajjanā – sambahule bhante bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:15_1: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū akālacīvaraṁ paṭiggahetvā māsaṁ atikkāmesuṁ,
anya-e0905n2:17_0: Pucchā – aññātikāya āvuso bhikkhuniyā purāṇacīvaraṁ dhovāpentassa nissaggiyaṁ pācittiyaṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ.

anya-e0905n2:20_1: āyasmā bhante udāyī aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā purāṇacīvaraṁ dhovāpesi,
anya-e0905n2:22_0: Pucchā – aññātikāya āvuso bhikkhuniyā hatthato cīvaraṁ paṭiggaṇhantassa nissaggiyaṁ pācittiyaṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ.

anya-e0905n2:25_0: Vissajjanā – āyasmantaṁ bhante udāyiṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:25_1: āyasmā bhante udāyī aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā hatthato cīvaraṁ paṭiggahesi,
anya-e0905n2:27_0: Pucchā – aññātakaṁ āvuso gahapatiṁvā gahatāniṁvā cīvaraṁ viññāpentassa nissaggiyaṁ pācittiyaṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n2:29_0: Pucchā – kaṁ āvuso ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n2:30_0: Vissajjanā – āyasmantaṁ bhante upanandaṁ sakyaputtaṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:30_1: āyasmā bhante upanando sakyaputto aññātakaṁ seṭṭhiputtaṁ cīvaraṁ viññāpesi,
anya-e0905n2:32_0: Pucchā – aññātakaṁ āvuso gahapatiṁ vā gahapatāniṁ vā tatuttari cīvaraṁ viññāpentassa nissaggiyaṁ pācittiyaṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n2:34_0: Pucchā – kaṁ āvuso ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n2:35_0: Vissajjanā – chabbaggiye bhante bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:35_1: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū na mattaṁ jānitvā bahumpi cīvaraṁ viññāpesuṁ,
anya-e0905n2:36_0: Pucchā – pubbe appavāritassa āvuso aññātakaṁ gahapatiṁ vā gahatāniṁ vā upasaṅkamitvā cīvare vikappaṁ āpajjantassa ca aññātake gahapatike upasaṅkamitvā cīvare vikappaṁ āpajjantassa ca nissaggiyaṁ pācittiyaṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n2:38_0: Pucchā – kaṁ āvuso ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n2:39_0: Vissajjanā – āyasmantaṁ bhante upanandaṁ sakyaputtaṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:39_1: āyasmā bhante upanando sakyaputto pubbe appavārito aññātakaṁ gahapatikaṁ upasaṅkamitvā cīvare vikappaṁ āpajji.
anya-e0905n2:39_2: Soyeva bhante āyasmā upanando sakyaputto pubbe appavārito aññātake gahapatike upasaṅkamitvā cīvare vikappaṁ āpajji,
anya-e0905n2:41_0: Pucchā – atirekatikkhattuṁ āvuso codanāya atireka chakkhattuṁ ṭhānena cīvaraṁ abhinipphādentassa nissaggiyaṁ pācittiyaṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n2:43_0: Pucchā – kaṁ āvuso ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n2:44_0: Vissajjanā – āyasmantaṁ bhante upanandaṁ sakyaputtaṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:44_1: āyasmā bhante upanando sakyaputto upāsakena ajjaṇho bhante āgamehīti vuccamāno nāgamesi,
anya-e0905n2:46_0: Pucchā – kosiyamissakaṁ āvuso santhakaṁ kārāpentassa nissaggiyaṁ pācittiyaṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n2:48_0: Pucchā – kaṁ 0 āvuso ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n2:49_1: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū kosiyakārake upasaṅkamitvā evamahaṁsu bahū āvuso kosakārake pacatha amhākampi dassatha mayampi icchāma kosiyamissakaṁ santakaṁ kātunti,
anya-e0905n2:51_0: Pucchā – suddhakāḷakānaṁ āvuso eḷakalomānaṁ santhataṁ kārāpentassa nissaggiyaṁ pācittiyaṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n2:53_0: Pucchā – kaṁ āvuso ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n2:54_0: Vissajjanā – chabbaggiye bhante bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:54_1: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū suddhakāḷakānaṁ eḷakalomānaṁ santhataṁ kārāpesuṁ,
anya-e0905n2:56_0: Pucchā – anādiyitvā āvuso tulaṁ odātānaṁ tulaṁ gocariyānaṁ navaṁ santhataṁ kārāpentassa nissaggiyaṁ pācittiyaṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n2:58_0: Pucchā – kaṁ āvuso ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n2:59_0: Vissajjanā – chabbaggiye bhante bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:59_1: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū thokaṁyeva odātaṁ ante ādiyitvā tatheva suddhakāḷakānaṁ eḷakalomānaṁ santhataṁ kārāpesuṁ,
anya-e0905n2:61_0: Pucchā – yaṁ tena āvuso bhagavatā…pe… sammāsambuddhena anuvassaṁ kārāpentassa nissaggiyaṁ pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n2:63_0: Pucchā – kaṁ āvuso ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n2:64_0: Vissajjanā – sambahule bhante bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:64_1: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū anuvassaṁ santhataṁ kārāpesuṁ,
anya-e0905n2:66_0: Vissajjanā – bhagavato bhante vacanaṁ arahato sammāsambuddhassa.
anya-e0905n2:69_0: Pucchā – atthi nukho āvuso ettha koci viraddhadoso.
anya-e0905n2:72_1: ahaṁ āyasmantaṁ vicittasārābhivaṁsaṁ tipiṭakadhara dhammabhaṇḍāgārikaṁ imesaṁ nissaggiyapācittiyasikkhāpadānaṁ yāva chabbassasikkhāpadaṁ nidānādīni pucchitabbāni anekāni ṭhānāni pucchiṁ,
anya-e0905n2:72_2: puṭṭhopuṭṭho ca so āyasmā vicittasārābhivaṁso vissajjesi,
anya-e0905n2:72_3: itihidaṁ bhante imāni sikkhāpadāni nimmalāni suparisuddhānī tasseva bhagavato vacanāni arahato sammāsambuddhassa,
anya-e0905n2:72_4: tasmā yathāpure mahākassapādayo mahātheravarā porāṇasaṁgītikārā brahmacariyassa ciraṭṭhitiyā bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāya atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussānaṁ dhammavinayaṁ saṁgāyiṁsu ceva anusaṁgāyiṁsu ca,
anya-e0905n2:72_5: evameva mayampi dāni sabbeva chaṭṭhasaṁgīti mahādhammasabhā pariyāpannā chabbassa nissaggiya sikkhāpadato paṭṭhāya imāni nissaggiyasikkhāpadāni ekato gaṇasajjhāyaṁ katvā saṁhāyeyyāma.
anya-e0905n2:74_0: Pucchā – yaṁ tena āvuso bhagavatā…pe… sammāsambuddhena anādiyitvā purāṇasanthatassa sāmantā sugatavidattiṁ navaṁ nisīdanasanthataṁ kārāpentassa nissaggiyaṁ pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n2:76_0: Pucchā – kaṁ āvuso ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n2:77_0: Vissajjanā – sambahule bhante bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:77_1: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū santhatāni ujjhitvā āraññikaṁ piṇḍapātikaṅgaṁ paṁsukūlakaṅgaṁ samādiyiṁsu,
anya-e0905n2:79_0: Pucchā – eḷakalomāni āvuso paṭiggahetvā tiyojanaṁ atikkāmentassa nissaggiyaṁ pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n2:81_0: Pucchā – kaṁ āvuso ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n2:82_0: Vissajjanā – aññataraṁ bhante bhikkhuṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:82_1: aññataro bhante bhikkhu eḷakalomāni paṭiggahetvā tiyojanaṁ atikkāmesi,
anya-e0905n2:84_0: Pucchā – aññātikāya āvuso bhikkhuniyā eḷakalomāni dhovāpentassa nissaggiyaṁ pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n2:86_0: Pucchā – kaṁ āvuso ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n2:87_0: Vissajjanā – chabbaggiye bhante bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:87_1: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū aññātikāhi bhikkhūnīhi eḷakalomāni dhovāpesuṁ,
anya-e0905n2:89_0: Pucchā – rūpiyaṁ āvuso paṭiggaṇhantassa nissaggiyaṁ pācittiyaṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n2:91_0: Pucchā – kaṁ āvuso ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n2:92_0: Vissajjanā – āyasmantaṁ bhante upanandaṁ sakyaputtaṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:92_1: āyasmā bhante upanando sakyaputto rūpiyaṁ paṭiggahesi,
anya-e0905n2:93_0: Pucchā – kathaṁ āvuso tattha paṭipajjanto rūpiyaṁ paṭiggaṇhāti nāma.
anya-e0905n2:94_0: Vissajjanā – sayaṁ bhante gaṇhāti, aññaṁ vā gaṇhāpesi,
anya-e0905n2:94_2: evaṁ kho bhante paṭipajjanto bhikkhu rūpiyaṁ paṭiggaṇhāti nāma.
anya-e0905n2:95_0: Pucchā – kathaṁ āvuso tattha paṭipajjanto bhikkhu rūpiyaṁ na paṭiggaṇhāti nāma.
anya-e0905n2:96_0: Vissajjanā – yathā bhante rājasikkhāpade yathā ca bhante meṇḍakasikkhāpade āgacchati,
anya-e0905n2:96_1: tathā bhante paṭipajjanto bhikkhu rūpiyaṁ na paṭiggaṇhātināma.
anya-e0905n2:98_0: Pucchā – rūpiyasaṁvohāraṁ āvuso samāpajjantassa nissaggiyaṁ pācittiyaṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n2:100_0: Pucchā – kaṁ āvuso ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n2:101_0: Vissajjanā – chabbaggiye bhante bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:101_1: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū nānappakārakaṁ rūpiyasaṁvohāraṁ samāpajjiṁsu,
anya-e0905n2:103_0: Pucchā – nānappakārakaṁ āvuso kayavikkayaṁ āpajjantassa nissaggiyaṁ pācittiyaṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n2:105_0: Pucchā – kaṁ āvuso ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n2:106_0: Vissajjanā – āyasmantaṁ bhante upanandaṁ sakyaputtaṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:106_1: āyasmā bhante upanando sakyaputto paribbājakena saddhi kayavikkayaṁ samāpajji,
anya-e0905n2:107_0: Pucchā – kathaṁ āvuso tattha paṭipajjanto bhikkhu kayavikkayaṁ samāpajjatināma.
anya-e0905n2:108_0: Vissajjanā – iminā imaṁ dehi iminā imaṁ āhara iminā imaṁ parivattehi iminā imaṁ cetāmehīti ajjhācarati,
anya-e0905n2:108_1: evaṁ kho bhante paṭipajjanto kayavikkayaṁ samāpajjatināma.
anya-e0905n2:109_0: Pucchā – kathaṁ āvuso tattha paṭipajjanto bhikkhu na kayavikkayaṁ samāpajjatināma.
anya-e0905n2:110_2: yo ca bhante amhākañca idaṁ atthi amhākañca iminā ca iminā ca atthoti bhaṇati,
anya-e0905n2:110_3: evaṁ kho bhante paṭipajjanto bhikkhu na kayavikkayaṁ samāpajjatināma.

anya-e0905n2:115_0: Vissajjanā – chabbaggiye bhante bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:117_0: Pucchā – ūnapañcabandhanena pattena aññaṁ navaṁ pattaṁ cetāpentassa nissaggiyaṁ pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n2:119_0: Pucchā – kaṁ āvuso ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n2:120_0: Vissajjanā – chabbaggiye bhante bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:120_1: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū appamattakenapi bhinnena appamattakenapi khaṇḍena vilikhitamattenapi bahū patte viyyāpesuṁ,
anya-e0905n2:123_0: Pucchā – bhesajjāni āvuso paṭiggahetvā sattāhaṁ atikkāmentassa nissaggiyaṁ pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n2:125_0: Pucchā – kaṁ āvuso ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n2:126_0: Vissajjanā – sambahule bhante bhikkhū ārabbha ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:126_1: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū bhesajjāni paṭiggahetvā sattāhaṁ atikkāmesuṁ,
anya-e0905n2:128_0: Pucchā – atirekamāse sese gimāne āvuso vassikasāṭikacīvaraṁ pariyesantassa nissaggiyaṁ pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n2:130_0: Pucchā – kaṁ āvuso ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n2:131_0: Vissajjanā – chabbaggiye bhante bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:131_1: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū atirekamāse sese gimhāne vassikasāṭikacīvaraṁ pariyesiṁsu,
anya-e0905n2:133_0: Pucchā – bhikkhussa āvuso sāmaṁ cīvaraṁ datvā kupitena anattamanena acchindantassa nissaggiyaṁ pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ.

anya-e0905n2:136_0: Vissajjanā – āyasmantaṁ bhante upanandaṁ sakyaputtaṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:136_1: āyasmā bhante upanando sakyaputto bhikkhussa sāmaṁ cīvaraṁ datvā kupito anattamano acchindi,
anya-e0905n2:138_0: Pucchā – sāmaṁ āvuso suttaṁ viññāpetvā tantavāyehi cīvaraṁ vāyāpentassa nissaggiyaṁ pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n2:140_0: Pucchā – kaṁ āvuso ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n2:141_0: Vissajjanā – chabbaggiye bhante bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:141_1: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū sāmaṁ suttaṁ viññāpetvā tantavāyehi cīvaraṁ vāyāpesuṁ,
anya-e0905n2:143_0: Pucchā – pubbe appavāritassa āvuso aññātakassa gahapatikassa tantavāye upasaṅkamitvā cīvare vikappaṁ āpajjantassa nissaggiyaṁ pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n2:145_0: Pucchā – kaṁ āvuso ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n2:146_0: Vissajjanā – āyasmantaṁ bhante upanandaṁ sakyaputtaṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:146_1: āyasmā bhante upanando sakyaputto pubbe appavārito aññātakassa gahapatikassa tantavāye upasaṅkamitvā cīvare vikappaṁ āpajji,
anya-e0905n2:148_0: Pucchā – acceka cīvaraṁ āvuso paṭiggahetvā cīvarakālasamayaṁ atikkāmentassa nissaggiyaṁ pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n2:150_0: Pucchā – kaṁ āvuso ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n2:151_0: Vissajjanā – sambahule bhante bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:151_1: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū accekacīvaraṁ paṭiggahetvā cīvarakālasamayaṁ atikkāmesuṁ,
anya-e0905n2:153_0: Pucchā – tiṇṇaṁ āvuso cīvarānaṁ aññataraṁ cīvaraṁ antaraghare nikkhipitvā atirekachārattaṁ vippavasantassa nissaggiyaṁ pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n2:155_0: Pucchā – kaṁ āvuso ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n2:156_0: Vissajjanā – sambahule bhante bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:156_1: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū tiṇṇaṁ cīvarānaṁ aññataraṁ cīvaraṁ antaraghare nikkhipitvā atirekachārattaṁ vippavasiṁsu,
anya-e0905n2:158_0: Pucchā – yaṁ tena āvuso bhagavatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena jānaṁ saṅghikaṁ lābhaṁ atthano pariṇāmentassa nissaggiyaṁ pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n2:160_0: Pucchā – kaṁ āvuso ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n2:161_0: Vissajjanā – chabbaggiye bhante bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:161_1: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū jānaṁ saṅghikaṁ lābhaṁ pariṇataṁ attano pariṇāmesuṁ,
anya-e0905n2:162_0: Pucchā – jānaṁ āvuso saṅghikaṁ lābhaṁ pariṇataṁ attano pariṇāmento, kati āpattiyo āpajjati.
anya-e0905n2:163_0: Vissajjanā – jānaṁ bhante saṅghikaṁ lābhaṁ pariṇataṁ attano pariṇāmento dve āpattiyo āpajjati, pariṇāmeti payoge dukkaṭaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:163_2: jānaṁ bhante saṅghikaṁ lābhaṁ pariṇataṁ attano pariṇāmento imā dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
anya-e0905n2:165_0: Vissajjanā – bhagavato bhante vacanaṁ arahato sammāsambuddhassa.
anya-e0905n2:168_0: Pucchā – atthi nukho āvuso tattha kocipi viraddhadoso.
anya-e0905n2:171_1: ahaṁ bhante imesaṁ soḷasannaṁ nissaggiyapācittiyasikkhāpadānaṁ nidānādīni anekāni pucchitabbāni āyasmantaṁ vicittasārābhivaṁsaṁ tipiṭakadhara dhammabhaṇḍāgārikaṁ pucchiṁ,
anya-e0905n2:171_3: itihidaṁ bhante sikkhāpadasañjātaṁ nimmalaṁ su parisuddhaṁ tasseva bhagavato vacanaṁ arahato sammāsambuddhassa,
anya-e0905n2:171_4: tasmā yathā pure mahākassapādayo mahāthera varā porāṇasaṁgītikārā brahmacariyasaṅkhātassa buddhasāsanassa ciraṭṭhitiyā bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāya atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussānaṁ dhammavinayaṁ saṁgāyiṁsuceva anusaṁgāyiṁsuca,
anya-e0905n2:171_5: evameva mayampi dāni chaṭṭhasaṁgīti mahādhammasabhāpariyāpannā imāni sikkhāpadāni yathānuppattaṭṭhānato paṭṭhāya ekato gaṇasajjhāyaṁ katvā saṁgāyeyyāma.
anya-e0905n2:174_0: Pucchā – yaṁ tena āvuso bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena sampajānamusāvāde pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:175_2: hatthako bhante sakyaputto titthiyehi saddhiṁ sallapanto avajānitvā paṭijānāti paṭijānitvā avajānāti,
anya-e0905n2:177_0: Pucchā – omasavāde pācittiyañca āvuso bhikkhupesuññe pācittiyañca bhagavatā katthapaññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:178_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū bhikkhūhi saddhiṁ bhaṇḍantā omasiṁsu tasmiṁca vatthusmiṁ,
anya-e0905n2:178_3: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū bhikkhūnaṁ bhaṇḍanajātānaṁ kalahajātānaṁ vivādāpannānaṁ pesuññaṁ upasaṁhariṁsu,
anya-e0905n2:180_0: Pucchā – anupasampannaṁ āvuso padaso vācentassa pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:181_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū upāsake padaso dhammaṁ vācesuṁ,
anya-e0905n2:183_0: Pucchā – anupasampannena āvuso uttaridirattatirattaṁ sahaseyyaṁ kappentassa pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:184_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū anupasampannena sahaseyyaṁ kappesuṁ,
anya-e0905n2:185_0: Pucchā – kesaṁ āvuso ettha anupasampannena sahaseyyaṁ kappentānampi anāpatti hoti.
anya-e0905n2:186_0: Vissajjanā – ekādasannaṁ bhante puggalānaṁ anupasampannena sahaseyyaṁ kappentānaṁ anāpatti, dvetisso rattiyo vasatī,
anya-e0905n2:186_2: dverattiyo vasitvā tatiyāyarattiyā purāruṇā nikkhamitvā puna vasati,
anya-e0905n2:186_7: bhikkhunipanne anupasampanno nisīdati, ubhovā nisīdanti, ummattakassa, ādikammikassa,
anya-e0905n2:186_8: imesaṁkho bhante ekādasannaṁ puggalānaṁ anupasampannena sahaseyyaṁ kappentānaṁ anāpatti.
anya-e0905n2:188_0: Pucchā – mātugāmena āvuso sahaseyyaṁ kappentassa pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:189_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante āyasmantaṁ anuruddhaṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:189_1: āyasmā bhante anuruddho mātugāmena sahaseyyaṁ kappesi,
anya-e0905n2:191_0: Pucchā – mātugāmassa āvuso uttari chappañcavācāhi dhammaṁ desentassa pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:192_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante āyasmantaṁ udāyiṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:194_0: Pucchā – anupasampannassa āvuso uttarimanussadhammaṁ bhūtaṁ ārocentassa pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:195_0: Vissajjanā – vesāliyaṁ bhante vaggumudātīriye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:195_1: vaggumudātīriyā bhante bhikkhū gihīnaṁ aññamaññassa uttarimanussadhammassa vaṇṇaṁ bhāsiṁsu,
anya-e0905n2:197_0: Pucchā – bhikkhussa āvuso duṭṭhullāpattiṁ anupasampannassa ārocentassa pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:198_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:198_1: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū bhikkhussa duṭṭhullāpattiṁ anupasampannassa ārocesuṁ,
anya-e0905n2:200_0: Pucchā – pathaviṁkhaṇantassa āvuso pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:201_0: Vissajjanā – āḷaviyaṁ bhante āḷavike bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:203_0: Pucchā – bhūtagāmapātabyatāya pācittiyaṁ āvuso bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:204_0: Vissajjanā – āḷaviyaṁ bhante āḷavike bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:204_1: āḷavikā bhante bhikkhū rukkhaṁ chindiṁ su,
anya-e0905n2:206_0: Pucchā – aññavādake vihesake pācittiyaṁ āvuso bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:207_0: Vissajjanā – kosambiyaṁ bhante āyasmantaṁ channaṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:207_1: āyasmā bhante channo saṅghamajjhe āpattiyā anuyuñjīyamāno aññenaññaṁ paṭicari,
anya-e0905n2:209_0: Pucchā – ujjhāpanake khiyyanake pācittiyaṁ āvuso bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:210_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante mettiyabhūmajake bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:210_1: mettiyabhūmajakā bhante bhikkhū āyasmantaṁ dabbaṁ mallaputtaṁ bhikkhū ujjhāpesuṁ,
anya-e0905n2:212_0: Pucchā – saṅghikaṁ āvuso mañcaṁvā pīṭhaṁvā bhisiṁvā kocchaṁvā ajjhokāse santharitvā anuddharitvā anāpucchā pakkamantassa pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:213_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:213_1: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū saṅghikaṁ senāsanaṁ ajjhokāse santharitvā anuddharitvā anāpucchā pakkamiṁsu,
anya-e0905n2:215_0: Pucchā – saṅghike āvuso vihāre seyyaṁ santharitvā anuddharitvā anāpucchā pakkamantassa pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:216_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante sattarasavaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:216_1: sattarasavaggiyā bhante bhikkhū saṅghike vihāre seyyaṁ santharitvā anuddharitvā anāpucchā pakkamiṁsu,
anya-e0905n2:218_0: Vissajjanā – bhagavatā bhante vacanaṁ arahato sammāsambuddhassa.
anya-e0905n2:221_0: Pucchā – atthi nukho āvuso ettha kocipi viraddhadoso.
anya-e0905n2:224_1: ahaṁ bhante āyasmantaṁ vicittasārābhivaṁsaṁ imesaṁ pannarasannaṁ sikkhāpadānaṁ nidānādīni pucchitabbāni anekāni ṭhānāni pucchiṁ,
anya-e0905n2:224_3: iti hidaṁ bhante nimmalaṁ suparisuddhaṁ tasseva bhagavato vacanaṁ arahato sammāsambuddhassa,
anya-e0905n2:224_4: tasmā yathāpure mahākassapādayo mahātheravarā porāṇasaṁgītikārā brahmacariyassa ciraṭṭhitiyā bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya lonukampāya atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussānaṁ dhammavinayaṁ saṁgāyiṁsuceva anusaṁgāyiṁsuca,
anya-e0905n2:224_5: evameva mayampi dāni chaṭṭhasaṁgītimahādhammasabhā pariyāpannā yathānuppaṭṭhānato paṭṭhāya imāni sikkhāpadāni ekato gaṇasajjhāyaṁ katvā saṁgāyeyyāma.
anya-e0905n2:226_0: Pucchā – yaṁ tena āvuso…pe… sammāsambuddhena saṅghike vihāre jānaṁ pubbupagataṁ bhikkhuṁ anupakhajja seyyaṁ kappentassa pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:227_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:227_1: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū there bhikkhū anupakhajja seyyaṁ kappesuṁ,
anya-e0905n2:229_0: Pucchā – bhikkhuṁ āvuso kupitena anattamanena saṅghikā vihārā nikkaḍḍhentassa pācittiyaṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:230_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:230_1: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū kupitā anattamanā bhikkhū saṅghikāvihārā nikkaḍḍhiṁsu,
anya-e0905n2:232_0: Pucchā – uparivehāsakuṭiyā āvuso āhaccapādakaṁ mañcaṁvā pīṭhaṁvā abhinisīdantassa pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:233_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante aññataraṁ bhikkhuṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:233_1: aññataro bhante bhikkhu saṅghike vihāre uparivehāsa kuṭiyā āhaccapādakaṁ mañcaṁ sahasā abhinisīdi,
anya-e0905n2:235_0: Pucchā – dvatti pariyāye āvuso adhiṭṭhahitvā tatuttari adhiṭṭhahantassa pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:236_0: Vissajjanā – kosambiyaṁ bhante āyasmantaṁ channattheraṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:236_1: āyasmā bhante chando katapariyositaṁ vihāraṁ punappunaṁ chādāpesi punappunaṁ lepāpesi, atibhārito vihāro paripati,
anya-e0905n2:238_0: Pucchā – jānaṁ āvuso sappāṇakaṁ udakaṁ tiṇaṁvā mattikaṁvā siñcantassa pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:239_0: Vissajjanā – āḷaviyaṁ bhante āḷavike bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:239_1: āḷavikā bhante bhikkhū jānaṁ sappāṇakaṁ udakaṁ tiṇampi mattikampi siñciṁsu,
anya-e0905n2:241_0: Pucchā – asammatena āvuso bhikkhuniyo ovadantassa pācittiyaṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:242_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:242_1: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū asammatā bhikkhuniyo ovadiṁsu,
anya-e0905n2:244_0: Pucchā – atthaṅgate āvuso sūriye bhikkhuniyo ovadantassa pācittiyaṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:245_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante āyasmantaṁ cūḷapanthakaṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:245_1: āyasmā bhante cūḷapanthako atthaṅgate sūriye bhikkhuniyo ovadi,
anya-e0905n2:247_0: Pucchā – bhikkhunupassayaṁ āvuso upasaṅkamitvā bhikkhuniyo ovadantassaca āmisahetu therā bhikkhū bhikkhuniyo ovadantīti bhaṇantassaca pācittiyaṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:248_0: Vissajjanā – bhikkhunupassayaṁ upasaṅkamitvā bhikkhuniyo ovadantassa pācittiyaṁ bhante sakkesu chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:248_1: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū bhikkhunupassayaṁ upasaṅkamitvā bhikkhuniyo ovadiṁsu,
anya-e0905n2:248_2: āmisahetu therā bhikkhū bhikkhuniyo ovadantīti bhaṇantassa pācittiyaṁ sāvatthiyaṁ chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:248_3: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū āmisahetu therā bhikkhū bhikkhuniyo ovadantīti bhaṇiṁsu,
anya-e0905n2:250_0: Pucchā – aññātikāya āvuso bhikkhuniyā cīvaraṁ dentassa pācittiyaṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:251_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante aññataraṁ bhikkhuṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:251_1: aññataro bhante bhikkhu aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā cīvaraṁ adāsi,
anya-e0905n2:253_0: Pucchā – aññātikāya āvuso bhikkhuniyā cīvaraṁ sibbentassa pācittiyaṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:254_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante āyasmantaṁ udāyiṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:254_1: āyasmā bhante udāyī aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā cīvaraṁ sibbesi,
anya-e0905n2:256_0: Pucchā – bhikkhunayā āvuso saddhiṁ saṁvidhāya ekaddhānamaggaṁ paṭipajjantassa pācittiyaṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:257_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:257_1: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū bhikkhunīhi saddhiṁ saṁvidhāya ekaddhānamaggaṁ paṭipajjiṁsu,
anya-e0905n2:259_0: Pucchā – bhikkhuniyā āvuso saddhiṁ saṁvidhāya ekaṁ nāvaṁ abhiruhantassa pācittiyaṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:260_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:260_1: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū bhikkhūnīhi saddhiṁ saṁvidhāya ekaṁ nāvaṁ abhiruhiṁsu,
anya-e0905n2:262_0: Pucchā – jānaṁ āvuso bhikkhuniparipācitaṁ piṇḍapātaṁ bhuñjantassa pācittiyaṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:263_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante devadattaṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:263_1: devadatto bhante jānaṁ bhikkhuniparipācitaṁ piṇḍapātaṁ bhuñji,
anya-e0905n2:265_0: Pucchā – bhikkhuniyā saddhiṁ āvuso eko ekāya raho nisajjaṁ kappentassa pācittiyaṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:266_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante āyasmantaṁ udāyiṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:266_1: āyasmā bhante udāyī bhikkhuniyā saddhiṁ eko ekāya raho nisajjaṁ kappesi,
anya-e0905n2:268_0: Pucchā – tatuttari āvuso āvasathapiṇḍaṁ bhuñjantassa pācittiyaṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:269_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:269_1: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū anuvasitvā anuvasitvā āvasathapiṇḍaṁ paribhuñjiṁsu,
anya-e0905n2:271_0: Pucchā – gaṇabhojane pācittiyaṁ āvuso bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:272_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante devadattaṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:272_1: devadatto bhante sapariso kulesu viññāpetvā bhuñji,
anya-e0905n2:274_0: Pucchā – parampara bhojane pācittiyaṁ āvuso bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:275_0: Vissajjanā – vesāliyaṁ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:275_1: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū aññatra nimantitā aññatra bhuñjiṁsu,
anya-e0905n2:277_0: Pucchā – dvattipattapūraṁ pūvaṁ paṭiggahetvā tatuttari paṭiggaṇhantassa pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:278_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:278_1: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū na mattaṁ jānitvā pūvaṁ paṭiggahesuṁ,
anya-e0905n2:280_0: Vissajjanā – bhagavato bhante vacanaṁ arahato sammāsambuddhassa.
anya-e0905n2:283_0: Pucchā – atthi nukho āvuso ettha kocipi viraddhadoso.
anya-e0905n2:286_0: Pucchā – yaṁ tena sāvuso…pe… sammāsambuddhena bhuttāvinā parivātena anatirittaṁ khādanīyaṁvā bhojanīyaṁvā bhuñjantassa pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:287_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:287_1: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū bhuttāvī pavāritā aññatra bhuñjiṁsu,
anya-e0905n2:289_0: Pucchā – bhikkhuṁ āvuso bhuttāviṁ pavāritaṁ anatirittena khādanīyena bhojanīyena abhihaṭṭhuṁ pavārentassa pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:290_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante aññataraṁ bhikkhuṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:290_1: aññataro bhante bhikkhu bhikkhuṁ bhuttāviṁ pavāritaṁ anatirittena bhojanīyena abhihaṭṭhuṁ pavāresi,
anya-e0905n2:292_0: Pucchā – vikāle āvuso khādanīyaṁ vā bhojanīyaṁ vā bhuñjantassa pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:293_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante sattarasavaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:293_1: sattarasavaggiyā bhante bhikkhū vikāle bhojanaṁ bhuñjiṁsu,
anya-e0905n2:295_0: Pucchā – sannidhikārakaṁ āvuso khādanīyaṁ vā bhojanīyaṁ vā bhuñjantassa pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:296_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante āyasmantaṁ belaṭṭhasīsaṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:296_1: āyasmā bhante belaṭṭhasīso sannidhikārakaṁ bhojanaṁ bhuñji,
anya-e0905n2:298_0: Pucchā – paṇīta bhojanāni āvuso attano atthāya viññāpetvā bhuñjantassa pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:299_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:299_1: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū paṇītabhojanāni attano atthāya viññāpetvā bhuñjiṁsu,
anya-e0905n2:301_0: Pucchā – adinnaṁ āvuso mukhadvāraṁ āhāraṁ āharantassa pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:302_0: Vissajjanā – vesāliyaṁ bhante aññataraṁ bhikkhuṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:302_1: aññataro bhante bhikkhu adinnaṁ mukhadvāraṁ āhāraṁ āhari,
anya-e0905n2:304_0: Pucchā – acelakassavā āvuso paribbājakassavā paribbājikāyavā sahatthā khādanīyaṁvā bhojanīyaṁvā dentassa pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:305_0: Vissajjanā – vesāliyaṁ bhante āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:305_1: āyasmā bhante ānando aññatarissā paribbājikāya ekaṁ maññamāno dve pūve adāsi,
anya-e0905n2:307_0: Pucchā – bhikkhuṁ ehāvuso gāmaṁvā nigamaṁvā piṇḍāya pavisissāmāti tassa dāpetvāvā adāpetvāvā uyyojentassa āvuso pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:308_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante āyasmantaṁ upanandaṁ sakyaputtaṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:308_1: āyasmā bhante upanando sakyaputto bhikkhu ehāvuso gāmaṁ piṇḍāya pavisissāmāti tassa adāpetvā uyyojesi,
anya-e0905n2:310_0: Pucchā – sabhojane kule anupakhajja nisajjaṁ kappentassa āvuso pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:311_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante āyasmantaṁ upanandaṁ sakyaputtaṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:311_1: āyasmā bhante upanando sakyaputto sabhojane kule anupakhajja nisajjaṁ kappesi,
anya-e0905n2:313_0: Pucchā – mātugāmena saddhiṁ raho paṭicchanne āsane nisajjaṁ kappentassaca āvuso mātugāmena saddhiṁ eko ekāya raho nisajjaṁ kappentassaca pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:314_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante āyasmantaṁ upanandaṁ sakyaputtaṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:314_1: āyasmā bhante upanando sakyaputto mātugāmena saddhiṁ raho paṭicchanne āsane nisajjaṁ kappesi,
anya-e0905n2:314_2: mātugāmena saddhiṁ eko ekāya raho nisajjaṁ kappesi,
anya-e0905n2:316_0: Pucchā – nimantitena āvuso sabhattena santaṁ bhikkhuṁ anāpucchā purebhattaṁvā pacchābhattaṁvā kulesu cārittaṁ āpajjantassa pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:317_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante āyasmantaṁ upanandaṁ sakyaputtaṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:317_1: āyasmā bhante upanando sakyaputto nimantito sabhatto samāno purebhattaṁ pacchābhattaṁ kulesu cārittaṁ āpajji,
anya-e0905n2:319_0: Pucchā – tatuttari āvuso bhesajjaṁ viññāpentassa pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:320_0: Vissajjanā – sakkesu bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:320_1: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū mahānāmena sakkena ajjaṇho bhante āgametāti vuccamānā nāgamesuṁ,
anya-e0905n2:322_0: Pucchā – uyyuttaṁ āvuso senaṁ dassanāya gacchantassa ca atirekatirattaṁ senāya vasantassa ca uyyodhikaṁ gacchantassa ca pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:323_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:323_1: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū uyyuttaṁ senaṁ dassanāya agamaṁsu,
anya-e0905n2:323_2: teyeva bhante chabbaggiyā bhikkhū atirekatirattaṁ senāya vasiṁsu,
anya-e0905n2:323_3: teyeva bhante chabbaggiyā bhikkhū uyyodhikaṁ agamaṁsu,
anya-e0905n2:325_0: Pucchā – surāmerayapāne āvuso pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:326_0: Vissajjanā – kosambiyaṁ bhante āyasmantaṁ sāgataṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:328_0: Pucchā – aṅgulipatodake āvuso pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:329_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:329_1: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū bhikkhuṁ aṅgulipatodakena hāsesuṁ,
anya-e0905n2:331_0: Pucchā – udake hasadhamme āvuso pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:332_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante sattarasavaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:332_1: sattarasavaggiyā bhante bhikkhū aciravatiyā nadiyā udake kīḷiṁsu,
anya-e0905n2:334_0: Pucchā – anādariya āvuso pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:335_0: Vissajjanā – kosambiyaṁ bhante āyasmantaṁ channaṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:335_1: āyasmā bhante channo āpattiyā anuyuñjiyamāno anādariyaṁ akāsi,
anya-e0905n2:337_0: Pucchā – bhikkhuṁ bhiṁsāpentassa āvuso pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:338_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:340_0: Pucchā – jotiṁ āvuso samādahitvā visibbentassa pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:341_0: Vissajjanā – bhaggesu bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:341_1: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū jotiṁ samādapetvā visibbesuṁ,
anya-e0905n2:343_0: Pucchā – orenaddhamāsaṁ āvuso nahāyantassa pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:344_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:344_1: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū rājānampi passitvā na mattaṁ jānitvā nahāyiṁsu,
anya-e0905n2:346_0: Vissajjanā – bhagavato bhante vacanaṁ arahato sammāsambuddhassa.
anya-e0905n2:349_0: Pucchā – atthi nukho āvuso ettha kocipi viruddhadoso.
anya-e0905n2:352_0: Pucchā – yaṁ tena āvuso…pe… sammāsambuddhena anādiyitvā tiṇṇaṁ dubbaṇṇakaraṇānaṁ aññataraṁ dubbaṇṇakaraṇaṁ navaṁ cīvaraṁ paribhuñjantassa pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:353_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:353_1: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū attano cīvaraṁ na sañjāniṁsu,
anya-e0905n2:355_0: Pucchā – bhikkhussa āvuso pattaṁ vā cīvaraṁ vā nisīdanaṁ vā sūcigharaṁ vā kāyabandhanaṁ vā apanidhentassa pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:356_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:356_1: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū bhikkhūnaṁ pattampi cīvarampi apanidhesuṁ,
anya-e0905n2:358_0: Pucchā – sañcicca āvuso pāṇaṁ jīvitā voropentassa pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:359_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante āyasmantaṁ udāyiṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ āyasmā bhante udāyī sañcicca pāṇaṁ jīvitā voropesi,
anya-e0905n2:361_0: Pucchā – jānaṁ āvuso sappāṇakaṁ udakaṁ paribhuñjantassa pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:362_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:362_1: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū jānaṁ sappāṇakaṁ udakaṁ paribhuñjiṁsu,
anya-e0905n2:364_0: Pucchā – jānaṁ āvuso theyyasatthena saddhiṁ saṁvidhāya ekaddhānamaggaṁ paṭipajjantassa pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:365_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante aññataraṁ bhikkhuṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:365_1: aññataro bhante bhikkhu jānaṁ theyyasatthena saddhiṁ saṁvidhāya ekaddhānamaggaṁ paṭipajji,
anya-e0905n2:367_0: Pucchā – mātugāmena saddhiṁ āvuso saṁvidhāya ekaddhānamaggaṁ paṭipajjantassa pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:368_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante aññataraṁ bhikkhuṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:368_1: aññataro bhante bhikkhu mātugāmena saddhiṁ saṁvidhāya ekaddhānamaggaṁ paṭipajji,
anya-e0905n2:370_0: Pucchā – bhikkhūhi āvuso sahadhammikaṁ vuccamānena na tāvāhaṁ āvuso etasmiṁ sikkhāpade sikkhissāmi,
anya-e0905n2:370_1: yāva na aññaṁ bhikkhuṁ byattaṁ vinayadharaṁ paripucchissāmīti bhaṇantassa pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:371_0: Vissajjanā – kosambiyaṁ bhante āyasmantaṁ channaṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:371_1: āyasmā bhante channo bhikkhūhi sahadhammikaṁ vuccamāno na tāvāhaṁ āvuso etasmiṁ sikkhāpade sikkhissāmi,
anya-e0905n2:371_2: yāva na aññaṁ bhikkhuṁ byattaṁ vinayadharaṁ paripucchissāmīti bhaṇi,
anya-e0905n2:373_0: Pucchā – vinayaṁ vivaṇṇentassa āvuso pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:374_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:376_0: Pucchā – mohanake āvuso pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:377_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:378_0: Pucchā – bhikkhussa āvuso kupitena anattamanena pahāraṁ dentassa ca talasattikaṁ uggirantassa ca pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:379_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:379_1: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū kupitā anattamanā sattarasavaggiyānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ pahāraṁ adaṁsu, talasattikañca uggiriṁsu,
anya-e0905n2:381_0: Pucchā – bhikkhussa āvuso sañcicca kukkuccaṁ upadahantassa pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:382_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:382_1: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū bhikkhūnaṁ sañcicca kukkuccaṁ upadahiṁsu,
anya-e0905n2:384_0: Pucchā – bhikkhūnaṁ āvuso bhaṇḍanajātānaṁ kalahajātānaṁ vivādā pannānaṁ upassutiṁ tiṭṭhantassa pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:385_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:385_1: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū bhikkhūnaṁ bhaṇḍanajātānaṁ kalaha jātānaṁ vivādāpannānaṁ upassutiṁ tiṭṭhahiṁsu,
anya-e0905n2:387_0: Pucchā – dhammikānaṁ āvuso kammānaṁ chandaṁ datvā pacchā khīyanadhammaṁ āpajjantassa pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:388_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:388_1: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū dhammikānaṁ kammānaṁ chandaṁ datvā pacchā khīyanadhammaṁ āpajjiṁsu,
anya-e0905n2:390_0: Pucchā – saṅghe āvuso vinicchakathāya vattamānāya chandaṁ adatvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkamantassa pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:391_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante aññataraṁ bhikkhuṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:391_1: aññataro bhante chabbaggiyo bhikkhu saṅghe vinicchayakathāya vattamānāya chandaṁ adatvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkāmi,
anya-e0905n2:393_0: Pucchā – jānaṁ āvuso saṅghikaṁ lābhaṁ pariṇataṁ puggalassa pariṇāmentassa pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:394_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:394_1: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū jānaṁ saṅghikaṁ lābhaṁ pariṇataṁ puggalassa pariṇāmesuṁ,
anya-e0905n2:396_0: Pucchā – pubbe appaṭisaṁviditena āvuso rañño antepuraṁ pavisantassa pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:397_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:397_1: āyasmā bhante ānando pubbe appaṭisaṁvidito rañño antepuraṁ pāvisi,
anya-e0905n2:399_0: Pucchā – ratanaṁ āvuso uggaṇhantassa pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:400_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante aññataraṁ bhikkhuṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:402_0: Pucchā – santaṁ āvuso bhikkhuṁ anāpucchā vikāle gāmaṁ pavisantassa pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:403_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:403_1: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū santaṁ bhikkhuṁ anāpucchā vikāle gāmaṁ pavisiṁsu,
anya-e0905n2:406_0: Pucchā – sekkhasammatesu āvuso kulesu khādanīyaṁ vā bhojanīyaṁ vā sahatthā paṭiggahetvā bhuñjantassa pāṭidesanīyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:407_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:407_1: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū namattaṁ jānitvā paṭiggahesuṁ,
anya-e0905n2:409_0: Pucchā – anādariyaṁ āvuso paṭicca purato vā pacchato vā olambentena nivāsentassaca pārupantassaca dukkaṭaṁ kattha paññattaṁ, kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n2:410_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:410_1: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū purato ca pacchato ca olambantā nivāsesuṁceva pārupiṁsuca,
anya-e0905n2:411_0: Pucchā – anādariyaṁ āvuso paṭicca kāyaṁ vivaritvā antaraghare gacchantassa ca nisīdantassa ca dukkaṭaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:412_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante chabbaggīye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:412_1: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū kāyaṁ vivaritvā antaraghare gacchiṁsu ceva nisīdiṁsuca,
anya-e0905n2:413_0: Pucchā – anādariyaṁ āvuso paṭicca hatthaṁ vā pādaṁ vā kīḷāpentena antaraghare gacchantassa ca nisīdantassa ca,
anya-e0905n2:413_1: tahaṁ tahaṁ olokentena antaraghare gacchantassa ca nisīdantassa ca,
anya-e0905n2:413_2: ukkhittakāya antaraghare gacchantassa ca nisīdantassa ca dukkaṭaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:414_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:414_1: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū hatthampi pādampi kīḷāpentā tahaṁ tahaṁpi olokentā antaraghare gacchiṁsuceva nisīdiṁsu ca,
anya-e0905n2:414_2: teyeva bhante chabbaggiyā bhikkhū ukkhittakāya antaraghare gacchiṁsuceva nisīdiṁsuca,
anya-e0905n2:415_0: Pucchā – anādariyaṁ āvuso paṭicca ujjagghikāya vā uccāsaddaṁ mahāsaddaṁ karontena vā antaraghare gacchantassaca nisīdantassaca dukkaṭaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:416_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:416_1: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū mahāhasitaṁ hasantā ca uccāsaddaṁ mahāsaddaṁ karontā ca antaraghare gacchiṁsuceva nisīdiṁsuca,
anya-e0905n2:417_0: Pucchā – anādariyaṁ āvuso paṭicca kāyappacālakaṁ vā bāhuppa cālakaṁ vā sīsappacālakaṁ vā khambhakatena vā oguṇṭhitena vā antaraghare gacchantassa ca nisīdantassa ca ukkuṭikāya kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n2:418_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:418_1: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū kāyappacālakaṁ bāhuppacālakaṁ sīsappacālakaṁ karontā ca khambhīkatā ca oguṇṭhitā ca antaraghare gacchiṁsuceva nisīdiṁsuca,
anya-e0905n2:419_0: Pucchā – anādariyaṁ āvuso paṭicca pallatthikāya antaraghare nisinnassa dukkaṭaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:420_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:420_1: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū pallatthikāya antaraghare nisīdiṁsu,
anya-e0905n2:421_0: Pucchā – anādariyaṁ āvuso paṭicca asakkaccaṁ piṇḍapātaṁ paṭiggaṇhantassa ca tahaṁ tahaṁ olokentena piṇḍapātaṁ paṭiggaṇhantassaca sūpaññeva bahuṁ paṭiggaṇhantassaca thūpīkataṁ piṇḍapātaṁ paṭiggaṇhantassaca dukkaṭaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:422_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:422_1: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū asakkaccaṁ piṇḍapātaṁ paṭiggahesuṁ,
anya-e0905n2:423_0: Pucchā – anādariyaṁ āvuso paṭicca āsakkaccaṁ piṇḍapātaṁ bhuñjantassaca tahaṁ tahaṁ olokentana piṇḍapātaṁ bhuñjantassa ca tahaṁ tahaṁ omasitvā piṇḍapātaṁ bhuñjantassa ca sūpaññeva bahuṁ bhuñjantassa ca thūpakato omadditvā piṇḍapātaṁ bhuñjantassa ca sūpaṁ vā byañjanaṁ vā odanena paṭicchādentassa ca dukkaṭaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:424_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:424_1: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū asakkaccaṁ piṇḍapātaṁ bhuñjiṁsu,
anya-e0905n2:424_3: teyeva bhante chabbaggiyā bhikkhū tahaṁ tahaṁ omasitvā piṇḍapātaṁ bhuñjiṁsu,
anya-e0905n2:424_4: teyeva bhante chabbaggiyā bhikkhū bahuṁ sūpaṁ bhuñjiṁsu,
anya-e0905n2:424_5: teyeva bhante chabbaggiyā bhikkhū thūpakato omadditvā piṇḍapātaṁ bhuñjiṁsu,
anya-e0905n2:424_6: teyeva bhante chabbaggiyā bhikkhū sūpampi byañjanampi odanena paṭicchādesuṁ,
anya-e0905n2:425_0: Pucchā – anādariyaṁ āvuso paṭicca sūpaṁvā odanaṁvā agilānena attano atthāya viññāpetvā bhuñjantassa dukkaṭaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:426_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:426_1: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū sūpampi odanampi attano atthāya viññāpetvā bhuñjiṁsu,
anya-e0905n2:427_0: Pucchā – anādariyaṁ āvuso paṭicca ujjhānasaññinā paresaṁ pattaṁ olokentassa ca atimahantaṁ kabaḷaṁ karontassa ca dīghaṁ ālopaṁ karontassa ca dukkaṭaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:428_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:428_1: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū ujjhānasaññino paresaṁ pattaṁ olokesuṁ,
anya-e0905n2:428_2: teyeva bhante chabbaggiyā bhikkhū atimahantaṁ kabaḷaṁ kariṁsu,
anya-e0905n2:428_3: teyeva bhante chabbaggiyā bhikkhū dīghaṁ ālopaṁ kariṁsu,
anya-e0905n2:429_0: Pucchā – anādariyaṁ āvuso paṭicca anāhaṭe kabaḷe mukhadvāraṁ vivarantassa ca bhuñjamāne sabbaṁ hatthaṁ mukhe pakkhipantassa ca sakabaḷena mukhena byāharantassa ca piṇḍukkhepakaṁ piṇḍapātaṁ bhuñjantassa ca kabaḷāvacchedakaṁ piṇḍapātaṁ bhuñjantassa ca avagaṇḍakārakaṁ piṇḍapātaṁ bhuñjantassa ca hatthaniddhunakaṁ sitthāvakārakaṁ jivhānicchārakaṁ capucapukārakaṁ piṇḍapātaṁ bhuñjantassa ca dukkaṭaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:430_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:430_1: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū anāhaṭe kabaḷe mukhadvāraṁ vivariṁsu,
anya-e0905n2:430_3: sakabaḷena mukhena byāhariṁsu, piṇḍukkhepakaṁ bhuñjiṁsu, kabaḷāvacchedakaṁ bhuñjiṁsu, avagaṇḍakārakaṁ bhuñjiṁsu,
anya-e0905n2:431_0: Pucchā – anādariyaṁ āvuso paṭicca surusurukārakaṁ bhuñjantassaca hatthanillehakaṁvā pattanillehakaṁ vā oṭṭhanillehakaṁ vā bhuñjantassa ca sāmisena hatthena pānīyathālakaṁ paṭiggaṇhantassa ca sasitthakaṁ pattadhovanaṁ antaraghare caḍḍentassa ca dukkaṭaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:432_0: Vissajjanā – suru surukārakaṁ bhante bhuñjantassa dukkaṭaṁ kosambiyaṁ paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:432_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū surusurukārakaṁ khīraṁ piviṁsu,
anya-e0905n2:432_4: Hatthanillehakaṁ bhuñjantassa ca pattanillehakaṁ bhuñjantassa ca oṭṭhanillehakaṁ bhuñjantassa dukkaṭaṁ sāvatthiyaṁ paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:432_6: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū hatthanillehakaṁ bhuñjiṁsu, pattanillehakaṁ bhuñjiṁsu, oṭṭhanillehakaṁ bhuñjiṁsu,
anya-e0905n2:433_0: Sāmisena hatthena pānīyathālakaṁ paṭiggaṇhantassa ca sasitthakaṁ pattadhovanaṁ antaraghare chaḍḍentassa ca dukkaṭaṁ bhaggesu paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:433_2: sambahulā bhikkhū sāmisena hatthena pānīyathālakaṁ paṭiggahesuṁ,
anya-e0905n2:433_3: teyeva bhante sambahulā bhikkhū sasitthakaṁ pattadhovanaṁ antaraghare chaḍḍesuṁ,
anya-e0905n2:434_0: Pucchā – anādariyaṁ āvuso paṭicca chattapāṇissa dhammaṁ desentassa ca daṇḍapāṇissa vā satthapāṇissa vā āvudhapāṇissa vā dhammaṁ desentassa ca dukkaṭaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:435_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:435_1: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū chattapāṇissa daṇḍapāṇissa satthapāṇissa āvudhapāṇissa dhammaṁ desesuṁ,
anya-e0905n2:436_0: Pucchā – anādariyaṁ āvuso paṭicca pādukāruḷhassa ca upahanāruḷhassa ca yānagatassa ca sayanagatassa ca dhammaṁ desentassa dukkaṭaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:437_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:437_1: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū pādukāruḷhassa upahanāruḷhassa yānagatassa sayanagatassa dhammaṁ desesuṁ,
anya-e0905n2:438_0: Pucchā – anādariyaṁ āvuso paṭicca pallatthikāya nisinnassa ca veṭhitasīsassa ca oguṇṭhitasīsassa ca chamāyaṁ nisīditvā āsane nisinnassa ca nīce āsane nisīditvā ucce āsane nisinnassa ca ṭhitena nisinnassa ca pacchato gacchantena purato gacchantassa ca uppathena gacchantena pathena gacchantassa ca dhammaṁ desentassa dukkaṭaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:439_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante chabbaggiyeva bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:439_1: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū pallatthikāya nisinnassa ca veṭhitasīsassa ca oguṇṭhitasīsassa ca chamāyaṁ nisīditvā āsane nisinnassa ca nīce āsane nisīditvā ucce āsane nisinnassa ca ṭhitānisinnassa ca pacchato gacchantā purato gacchantassa ca uppathena gacchantā pathena gacchantassa ca dhammaṁ desesuṁ,
anya-e0905n2:440_0: Pucchā – anādariyaṁ āvuso paṭicca ṭhitena uccāraṁ vā passāvaṁ vā karontassa ca harite vā udake vā uccāraṁ vā passāvaṁ vā kheḷaṁ vā karontassa ca dukkaṭaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:441_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante chabbaggiyeva bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:441_1: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū ṭhitā uccārampi passāvampi akaṁsu,
anya-e0905n2:441_2: teyeva bhante chabbaggiyā bhikkhū haritepi udakepi uccārampi passāvampi kheḷampi akaṁsu,
anya-e0905n2:444_0: Pucchā – bhikkhunīnaṁ āvuso pañcama pārājikaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:445_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante sundarīnandaṁ bhikkhuniṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:445_1: sundarīnandā bhante bhikkhunī avassutā avassutassa purisapuggalassa kāyasaṁsaggaṁ sādiyi,
anya-e0905n2:447_0: Pucchā – ussayavādikāya āvuso bhikkhuniyā aḍḍaṁ karontiyā saṅghādiseso kattha paññatto,
anya-e0905n2:448_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante tullanandaṁ bhikkhuniṁ ārabbha paññatto,
anya-e0905n2:449_0: Pucchā – coriṁ āvuso vuṭṭhāpentiyā saṅghādiseso kattha paññatto,
anya-e0905n2:450_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante thullanandaṁ bhikkhuniṁ ārabbha paññatto,
anya-e0905n2:451_0: Pucchā – ekāya āvuso gāmantaraṁ gacchantiyā saṅghādiseso kattha paññatto,
anya-e0905n2:452_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante aññataraṁ bhikkhuniṁ ārabbha paññatto,
anya-e0905n2:452_1: aññatarā bhante bhikkhunī ekā gāmantaraṁ gacchi,
anya-e0905n2:453_0: Pucchā – avassutāya āvuso bhikkhuniyā avassutassa purisapuggalassa hatthato khādanīyaṁvā bhojanīyaṁvā sahatthā paṭiggahetvā bhuñjantassa saṅghādiseso kattha paññatto,
anya-e0905n2:454_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante sundarīnandaṁ bhikkhuniṁ ārabbha paññatto,
anya-e0905n2:454_1: sundarīnandā bhante bhikkhunī avassutā avassutassa purisapuggalassa hatthato āmisaṁ paṭiggahesi tasmiṁ bhante vatthusmiṁ paññatto.
anya-e0905n2:455_0: Pucchā – kupitāya āvuso anattamanāya bhikkhuniyā yāvatatiyaṁ samanubhāsantiyā na paṭinisajjantiyā saṅghādiseso kattha paññatto,
anya-e0905n2:456_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante caṇḍakāḷiṁ bhikkhuniṁ ārabbha paññatto,
anya-e0905n2:456_1: caṇḍakāḷī bhante bhikkhunī kupitā anattamanā evaṁ abhaṇi, buddhaṁ paccācikkhāmi, dhammaṁ paccācikkhāmi, saṅghaṁ paccācikkhāmi, sikkhaṁ paccācikkhāmi,
anya-e0905n2:458_0: Vissajjanā – bhagavato bhante vacanaṁ arahato sammāsambuddhassa.
anya-e0905n2:461_0: Pucchā – atthi nukho āvuso ettha kocipi viraddhadoso.
anya-e0905n2:465_0: Pucchā – yaṁ tena āvuso bhagavatā…pe… sammāsambuddhena lakkhaṇaṁ khādantiyā pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:466_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante thullanandaṁ bhikkhuniṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:466_1: thullanandā bhante bhikkhunī na mattaṁ jānitvā bahuṁ lasuṇaṁ harāpesi,
anya-e0905n2:468_0: Pucchā – bhikkhussa āvuso bhuñjamānassa annena vā pānena vā vidhūpanena vā upatiṭṭhantiyā bhikkhuniyā pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:469_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante aññataraṁ bhikkhuniṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:469_1: aññatarā bhante bhikkhunī bhikkhussa bhuñjamānassa pānīyena vidhūpanena ca upatiṭṭhati,
anya-e0905n2:471_0: Pucchā – uccāraṁvā āvuso passāvaṁvā saṅkāraṁvā vighāsaṁvā thirokuṭṭe chaḍḍentiyā pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:472_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante aññataraṁ bhikkhuniṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:472_1: aññatarā bhante bhikkhunī uccāraṁ tirokuṭṭe chaḍḍesi,
anya-e0905n2:474_0: Pucchā – naccaṁ vā āvuso gītaṁ vā vāditaṁ vā dassanāya gacchantiyā pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:475_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:475_1: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhuniyo naccampi gītampi vāditampi dassanāya agamaṁsu,
anya-e0905n2:476_0: Pucchā – bhikkhupana āvuso naccaṁ vā gītaṁ vā vāditaṁ vā dassanāya gacchanto kaṁ nāma āpattiṁ āpajjati.
anya-e0905n2:479_0: Pucchā – rattandhakāre āvuso apadīpe purisena saddhiṁ ekenekāya santiṭṭhantiyā pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:480_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante aññataraṁ bhikkhuniṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:480_1: aññatarā bhante bhikkhunī rattandhakāre apadīpe purisena saddhiṁ ekenekā santiṭṭhi,
anya-e0905n2:482_0: Pucchā – paṭicchanne vā āvuso okāse ajjhokāse vā purisena saddhiṁ ekenekāya santiṭṭhantiyā pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:483_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante aññataraṁ bhikkhuniṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:483_1: aññatarā bhante bhikkhunī paṭicchanne okāse ajjhokāse ca purisena saddhiṁ ekenekā santiṭṭhi,
anya-e0905n2:485_0: Pucchā – duggahitena āvuso dūpadhāritena paraṁ ujjhāpentiyā pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:486_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante aññataraṁ bhikkhuniṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:486_1: aññatarā bhante bhikkhunī duggahitena dūpadhāritena paraṁ ujjhāpesi,
anya-e0905n2:488_0: Pucchā – attānaṁ vā āvuso paraṁ vā nirayena vā brahmacariyena vā abhisapantiyā pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:489_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante caṇḍakāḷiṁ bhikkhuniṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:489_1: caṇḍakāḷī bhante bhikkhunī attānampi parampi nirayenapi brahmacariyenapi abhisapi,
anya-e0905n2:491_0: Pucchā – attānaṁ āvuso vadhitvā vadhitvā rodantiyā pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:492_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante caṇḍakāḷiṁ bhikkhuniṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:492_1: caṇḍakāḷī bhante bhikkhunī bhikkhunīhi saddhiṁ bhaṇḍitvā attānaṁ vadhitvā vadhitvā rodi,
anya-e0905n2:494_0: Pucchā – bhikkhuniyā āvuso cīvaraṁ visibbetvā vā visibbāpetvā vā neva sibbentiyā na sibbāpanāya ussukkaṁ karontiyā pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:495_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante thullanandaṁ bhikkhuniṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:495_1: thullanandā bhante bhikkhunī bhikkhuniyā cīvaraṁ visibbāpetvā neva sibbesi na sibbāpanāya ussukkaṁ akāsi,
anya-e0905n2:497_0: Pucchā – agārikassa vā āvuso paribbājakassa vā paribbājikāya vā samaṇacīvaraṁ dentiyā pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:498_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante thullanandaṁ bhikkhuniṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:498_1: thullanandā bhante bhikkhunī agārikassa samaṇacīvaraṁ adāsi,
anya-e0905n2:500_0: Pucchā – dvinnaṁ āvuso bhikkhunīnaṁ ekamañce vā ekattharaṇapāvuraṇe vā tuvaṭṭentīnaṁ pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:501_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:501_1: sambahulā bhante bhikkhuniyo dve ekamañce tuvaṭṭesuṁ,
anya-e0905n2:503_0: Pucchā – bhikkhuniyā āvuso sañcicca aphāsuṁ karontiyā pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:504_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante thullanandaṁ bhikkhuniṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:504_1: thullanandā bhante bhikkhunī bhikkhuniyā sañcicca aphāsuṁ akāsi,
anya-e0905n2:506_0: Pucchā – dukkhitaṁ āvuso sahajīviniṁ neva upaṭṭhentiyā na upaṭṭhāpanāya ussukkaṁ karontiyā pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:507_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante thullanandaṁyeva bhikkhuniṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:507_1: thullanandā bhante bhikkhunī dukkhitaṁ sahajīviniṁ nevaupaṭṭhesi na upaṭṭhāpanāya ussukkaṁ akāsi,
anya-e0905n2:509_0: Pucchā – bhikkhuniyā āvuso upassayaṁ datvā kupitāya anattamanāya nikkaḍḍhantiyā pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:510_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante thullanandaṁyeva bhikkhuniṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:510_1: thullanandā bhante bhikkhunī bhikkhuniyā upassayaṁ datvā kupitā anattamanā nikkaḍḍhi,
anya-e0905n2:512_0: Pucchā – saṁsaṭṭhāya āvuso bhikkhuniyā yāvatatiyaṁ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjantiyā pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:513_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante caṇḍakāḷiṁ bhikkhuniṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:515_0: Pucchā – antoraṭṭhe vā āvuso tiroraṭṭhe vā sāsaṅkasammate sappaṭibhaye asatthikāya cārikaṁ carantiyā pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:516_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:516_1: sambahulā bhante bhikkhuniyo antoraṭṭhepi tiroraṭṭhepi sāsaṅkasammate sappaṭibhaye asatthikāyo cārikaṁ cariṁsu,
anya-e0905n2:518_0: Pucchā – antovassaṁ āvuso cārikaṁ carantiyā pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:519_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:519_1: sambahulā bhante bhikkhuniyo antovassaṁ cārikaṁ pakkamiṁsu,
anya-e0905n2:521_0: Pucchā – vassaṁ vuṭṭhāya āvuso bhikkhuniyā cārikaṁ na pakkamantiyā pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:522_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbhaṁ paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:522_1: sambahulā bhante bhikkhuniyo vassaṁvuṭṭhā cārikaṁ na pakkamiṁsu,
anya-e0905n2:524_0: Vissajjanā – bhagavato bhante vacanaṁ arahato sammāsambuddhassa.
anya-e0905n2:529_0: Pucchā – yaṁ tena āvuso bhagavatā…pe… sammāsambuddhena rājāgāraṁ vā cittāgāraṁ vā ārāmaṁ vā uyyānaṁ vā pokkharaṇiṁ vā dassanāya gacchantiyā pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:530_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:530_1: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhuniyo rājāgārampi cittāgārampi dassanāya gacchiṁsu,
anya-e0905n2:532_0: Pucchā – gihiveyyāvaccaṁ āvuso karontiyā pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:533_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:535_0: Pucchā – agārikassa vā āvuso paribbājakassa vā paribbājikāya vā sahatthā khādanīyaṁ bhojanīyaṁ dentiyā pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:536_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante thullanandaṁ bhikkhuniṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:536_1: thullanandā bhante bhikkhunī agārikassa sahatthā khādanīyampi bhojanīyampi adāsi,
anya-e0905n2:538_0: Pucchā – tiracchānavijjaṁ āvuso pariyāpuṇantiyā ca vācentiyā ca pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:539_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:539_1: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhuniyo tiracchānavijjaṁ pariyāpuṇiṁsuceva vācesuñca,
anya-e0905n2:540_0: Pucchā – bhikkhu pana āvuso tādisaṁ tiracchānavijjaṁ pariyāpuṇanto ca vācento ca kiṁ nāma āpattiṁ āpajjati.
anya-e0905n2:543_0: Pucchā – jānaṁ āvuso sabhikkhukaṁ ārāmaṁ anāpucchā pavisantiyā pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:544_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:544_1: sambahulā bhante bhikkhuniyo ārāmaṁ anāpucchā pavisiṁsu,
anya-e0905n2:546_0: Pucchā – bhikkhuṁ āvuso akkosantiyā pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:547_0: Vissajjanā – vesāliyaṁ bhante chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:547_1: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhuniyo āyasmantaṁ upāliṁ akkosiṁsu,
anya-e0905n2:549_0: Pucchā – caṇḍikatāya āvuso gaṇaṁ paribhāsantiyā pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:550_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante thullanandaṁ bhikkhuniṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:550_1: thullanandā bhante bhikkhunī caṇḍikatāya gaṇaṁ paribhāsi,
anya-e0905n2:552_0: Pucchā – kulaṁ āvuso maccharāyantiyā pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:553_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante aññataraṁ bhikkhuniṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:555_0: Pucchā – abhikkhuke āvuso āvāse vassaṁ vasantiyā pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:556_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:556_1: sambahulā bhante bhikkhuniyo abhikkhuke āvāse vassaṁ vasiṁsu,
anya-e0905n2:558_0: Pucchā – vassaṁ vuṭṭhāya āvuso bhikkhuniyā ubhatosaṅghe tīhi ṭhānehi na pavārentiyā pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:559_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:559_1: sambahulā bhante bhikkhuniyo vassaṁ vuṭṭhā bhikkhusaṅghaṁ na pavāresuṁ,
anya-e0905n2:561_0: Pucchā – ovādāya vā āvuso saṁvāsāya vā nagacchantiyā pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:562_0: Vissajjanā – sakkesu bhante chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:564_0: Pucchā – uposathampi āvuso na pucchantiyā ovādampi na yācantiyā pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:565_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:565_1: sambahulā bhante bhikkhuniyo uposathaṁ na pucchiṁsu, ovādampi na yāciṁsu,
anya-e0905n2:567_0: Pucchā – gabbhiniṁ vā āvuso pāyantiṁ vā vuṭṭhāpentiyā pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:568_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:568_1: sambahulā bhante bhikkhuniyo gabbhiniṁ vuṭṭhāpesuṁ, pāyantiṁ vuṭṭhāpesuṁ,
anya-e0905n2:570_0: Pucchā – dve vassāni āvuso chasu dhammesu asikkhitasikkhaṁ sikkhamānaṁ vuṭṭhāpentiyā pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:571_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:571_1: sambahulā bhante bhikkhuniyo dve vassāni chasu dhammesu asikkhitasikkhaṁ sikkhamānaṁ vuṭṭhāpesuṁ,
anya-e0905n2:573_0: Pucchā – purisasaṁsaṭṭhaṁ āvuso kumārakasaṁsaṭṭhaṁ caṇḍiṁ sokāvāsaṁ sikkhamānaṁ vuṭṭhāpentiyā pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:574_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante thullanandaṁ bhikkhuniṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:574_1: thullanandā bhante bhikkhunī purisasaṁsaṭṭhaṁ kumārakasaṁsaṭṭhaṁ caṇḍiṁ sokāvāsaṁ caṇḍakāḷiṁ sekkhamānaṁ vuṭṭhāpesi,
anya-e0905n2:576_0: Pucchā – mātāpitūhi vā āvuso sāmikena vā ananuññātaṁ sikkhamānaṁ vuṭṭhāpentiyā pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:577_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante thullanandaṁ bhikkhuniṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:577_1: thullanandā bhante bhikkhunī mātāpitūhipi sāmikenapi ananuññātaṁ sikkhamānaṁ vuṭṭhāpesi,
anya-e0905n2:579_0: Pucchā – chattupāhanaṁ āvuso dhārentiyā ca yānena yāyantiyā ca pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:580_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:580_1: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhuniyo chattupāhanaṁ dhāresuṁ, yānena yāyiṁsu,
anya-e0905n2:582_0: Pucchā – itthālaṅkāraṁ āvuso dhārentiyā pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:583_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:584_0: Pucchā – bhikkhu pana āvuso purisālaṅkāraṁ dhārento kiṁ nāma āpattiṁ āpajjeyya.
anya-e0905n2:587_0: Pucchā – gandhavaṇṇakena āvuso nahāyantiyā pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:588_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:590_0: Pucchā – bhikkhussa āvuso purato anāpucchā āsane nisīdantiyā pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:591_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:591_1: sambahulā bhante bhikkhuniyo bhikkhussa purato anāpucchā āsane nisīdiṁsu,
anya-e0905n2:593_0: Pucchā – anokāsakataṁ āvuso bhikkhuṁ pañhaṁ pucchantiyā pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:594_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:594_1: sambahulā bhante bhikkhuniyo anokāsakataṁ bhikkhuṁ pañhaṁ pucchiṁsu,
anya-e0905n2:595_0: Pucchā – sappiṁ vā āvuso telaṁ vā madhuṁ vā phāṇitaṁ vā macchaṁ vā maṁsaṁ vā khīraṁ vā dadhiṁ vā viññāpetvā bhuñjantiyā pāṭidesanīyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:596_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:596_1: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhuniyo sappimpi telampi madhumpi phāṇitampi macchampi maṁsampi khīrampi dadhimpi viññāpetvā bhuñjiṁsu,
anya-e0905n2:597_0: Pucchā – catunnaṁ āvuso vipattīnaṁ katamā vipatti.
anya-e0905n2:599_0: Pucchā – channaṁ āvuso āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṁ katihi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti.
anya-e0905n2:600_0: Vissajjanā – catūhi bhante samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti, siyā kāyato samuṭṭhāti, navācato nacittato,
anya-e0905n2:600_1: siyā kāyato ca vācato ca samuṭṭhāti, nacittato,
anya-e0905n2:600_2: siyā kāyato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti, navācato,
anya-e0905n2:600_3: siyā kāyato ca vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti,
anya-e0905n2:606_0: Vissajjanā – na evarūpaṁ karissāmīti yāvajīvaṁ āpāṇakoṭikaṁ samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesu, ayaṁ bhante paṭipatti.
anya-e0905n2:608_0: Vissajjanā – bhagavato bhante vacanaṁ arahato sammāsambuddhassa.
